modmenu.descriptionTranslation.spyhud: Spy Hud adds configurable zoom and a simple, informative HUD.
key.category.spyhud.title: Spy Hud
spyhud.config.title: Spy Hud Configuration
spyhud.tooltip.smooth_zoom: Specify if the zoom is a direct FOV change or a smooth interpolation to the desired zoom value
spyhud.tooltip.hold_to_zoom: Enable this option to zoom only while holding the zoom key.
spyhud.tooltip.lerp_speed: Change the zooming speed. The closer the value is to zero, the faster the zoom.
spyhud.tooltip.zoom_level: Adjust the intensity of the available zoom levels.
spyhud.tooltip.hud_animation: Choose how the HUD components appear and disappear on screen.
spyhud.tooltip.hud_animation_speed: Set the speed of the HUD Animation
spyhud.tooltip.hud_opacity: Set the opacity of the HUD
